forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 66, with temperatures falling to around 64 in the afternoon. West wind around 18 mph, with gusts as high as 24 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of drizzle after 11pm. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 59. West southwest wind 10 to 18 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

weather_report:
This evening in Downtown San Francisco, a gentle hush blankets the city as twilight descends. The air retains a touch of warmth from the day, though a westward breeze hints at the cool embrace of the approaching nighttime. Currently, the skyline is tinged with a mosaic of muted colors, a mix of soft hues interspersed by lingering patches of marine layer. As the forecast suggests, expect a slight chance of drizzle to tease the senses after the witching hour, yet for now, the atmosphere remains pleasantly overcast, with clouds that cradle an elusive glow.

As the temperature settles into a comfortable low, the West Southwest wind whispers promises of fleeting refreshment. Dressing in layers is wise; a light jacket should protect against the evening chill, while breathable fabrics will serve you well should you venture outdoors. With the clock crossing past ten, consider curling up with a good book in a cozy café or enjoying a contemplative stroll along the Embarcadero, where the city lights dance upon the water. Embrace the allure of the evening, knowing the city offers endless possibilities for exploration and escape.
